content: listed gauge should yield a blanket that is 32 inches across i used bernat softee baby - one skein each of lilac and white 5oz/140g each and one skein of pink/lilac/white variegated 4 25oz/120g the instructions are so easy and it can be worked in any thickness of yarn - just be aware that the thicker the yarn the larger the afghan - thinner yarn = smaller afghan
